title: [HOLD for payment 2024-03-20] [HOLD for payment 2024-03-19] [$500] Tag - Tag list shows old tag as selected when newer tag is selected in Split scan request
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: Precondition:
- User is an employee of Collect workspace.
- The Collect workspace has tags.
1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com
2. Go to workspace chat.
3. Go to + > Split bill > Scan.
4. Create a scan split with a tag.
5. Click on the split preview.
6. Click Tag.
7. Select a different tag.
8. Click Tag.

Expected result: The Tag list will show the newly-selected tag on the top

Actual result: None
